METRO INC. announces plan to buy back shares through private agreements
METRO INC. announces plan to buy back shares through private agreements
item.description: [PR Newswire] - MONTREAL, Jan. 9, 2017 /CNW Telbec/ - Metro inc. ("Metro") (MRU.TO) announced today that it intends to purchase for cancellation, on or before September 11, 2017, up to 2,610,000 of its Common Shares pursuant to private agreements between Metro and several arm's-length third-party sellers. The price that Metro will pay for any Common Shares purchased by it under such agreements will be negotiated by Metro and the relevant seller and will be at a discount to the prevailing market price of Metro's Common Shares on the Toronto Stock Exchange ("TSX") at the time of the purchase. Information regarding each purchase, including the number of Common Shares purchased and aggregate price paid, will be available on the System for Electronic Document Analysis and Retrieval (SEDAR) at www.sedar.com following the completion of any such purchase.
